articles.description: Tottenham's £65m striker Dominic Solanke is upstaged by Leicester's 37-year-old Jamie Vardy as the teams begin their Premier League campaigns.
articles.title: Jamie Vardy: How Leicester City's greatest striker outshone Tottenham new boy Dominic Solanke

articles.description: At the end of the Cold War, East Germany's systematic doping secrets spilled out. The truth on the other side of the Berlin Wall has taken longer to emerge.
articles.title: East v West Germany: The drug-fuelled Cold War for medals

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka wins her first title since January's Australian Open by powering past Jessica Pegula in the final of the Cincinnati Open.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Aryna Sabalenka beats Jessica Pegula to win first title since Australian Open

articles.description: Chelsea agree a fee in principle for Atletico Madrid forward Joao Felix, with Conor Gallagher moving in the other direction as part of the deal.
articles.title: Chelsea agree fee for Joao Felix to allow Gallagher to join Atleti

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's team of the week: Pope, Salah, Saka, Havertz, Alexander-Arnold, Maguire, Kovacic

articles.description: Former Manchester City captain Ilkay Gundogan could leave Barcelona after just one full season.
articles.title: Ilkay Gundogan: Former Man City captain could leave Barcelona this summer

articles.description: England name Matthew Potts in their side as an extra seamer for the first Test against Sri Lanka at Emirates Old Trafford on Wednesday.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Matthew Potts in hosts' XI for first Test

articles.description: Brighton complete the signing of forward Georginio Rutter for a club record fee of £40m from Leeds.
articles.title: Georginio Rutter: Brighton sign Leeds forward in £40m club record deal

articles.description: Track cyclist Matt Richardson, who won three medals for Australia at the Paris Olympics, switches nationality and will now represent Great Britain.
articles.title: Matt Richardson: Australian Olympian joins Great Britain cycling team

articles.description: With the close of the transfer window less than two weeks away, BBC Sport looks at the possible moves that could still happen.
articles.title: Transfer deadline day: Could Raheem Sterling, Ivan Toney, Jarrad Branthwaite, Jadon Sancho, Romelu Lukaku and Scott McTominay be on the move?
